context: Analyze this seated hip opener pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Lizard Pose (Utthan Pristhasana) Low lunge with forearms to ground. Consider the Hip flexor stretch, inner thigh opening, grounding. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Low lunge with forearms to ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Hip flexor stretch, inner thigh opening, grounding

specificNeeds: Hip flexor stretch, inner thigh opening, grounding
